CtaSection2.title: Commit to a sustainable future with Internxt!

FeatureSection.title: The importance of green cloud computing
FeatureSection.description: Internxt encourages innovation by promoting sustainable practices in cloud infrastructure without compromising performance or reliability.

reducedEnviromentalImpact.title: Reduced environmental impact
reducedEnviromentalImpact.description: Green cloud computing uses renewable energy to reduce carbon emissions, conserve energy, and minimize e-waste. By adopting this sustainable approach, we help businesses lower their environmental impact and help preserve the worldâ€™s natural resources.

increasedSavings.title: Increased savings
increasedSavings.description: We only use energy-efficient data centers that minimize hardware needs, lower operational expenses, and increase utility cost savings, which aligns with our eco-friendly goals.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Green cloud computing uses the best technologies to provide an eco-friendly solution for cloud infrastructures. Our data centers use water cooling technology designed to optimize energy efficiency and minimize consumption for a sustainable cloud storage solution.

focusOnRenewableEnergy.title: Focus on renewable energy
focusOnRenewableEnergy.description: Renewable energy powers green cloud computing, using renewable resources like solar, wind, and hydropower to reduce air pollution and environmental impact and help foster a world built on sustainable green cloud solutions.

FeatureSectionV2.title: Managing our environmental impact
FeatureSectionV2.description: Internxt leads by example in working for a more sustainable future through energy-efficient practices to minimize resource consumption and contribute to a greener future.

power.title: Power
power.description: Our data centers' Power Usage Effectiveness (PUE) is measured and audited every 12 months. Values measured closer to 1 indicate more efficient energy consumption.

water.title: Water
water.description: The metric measures how efficiently water is used; values closer to 0 indicate optimal performance.

carbon.title: Carbon
carbon.description: This tracks direct emissions and indirect commissions from electricity use, with values closest to 0 representing better performance.

renewables.title: Renewables
renewables.description: This refers to the percentage of Renewable Energy Factor (REF) rates used in our data centers.

FeatureSectionV3.title: A commitment to a sustainable future
FeatureSectionV3.description: By advancing green initiatives, we aim to protect the planet and strive for a cleaner, more green cloud storage solution.

reduceCarbonEnergy.title: Reduce carbon energy
reduceCarbonEnergy.description: By 2025, the centers we use will limit their reliance on carbon energy, switching to more renewable and lower-carbon energy sources, such as nuclear and hydroelectricity.

globalNetZero.title: Global NetZero
globalNetZero.description: Our green cloud computing solution is committed to achieving zero net emissions for Scope 1 (direct emissions from fuel) and Scope 2 (indirect emissions from electricity). 2023 will address scope 3, covering all other indirect emissions.

zeroWaste.title: Zero waste
zeroWaste.description: To reduce the environmental impact of landfill disposal and promote green initiatives, we are committed to zero waste to landfill by 2025 across all our server locations.
